current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend certain appropriations Acts to repeal the
		  requirement directing the Administrator of General Services to sell Federal
		  property and assets that support the operations of the Plum Island Animal
		  Disease Center in Plum Island, New York, and for other purposes.
